channel.title: Welcome to My Blog! on Jaan
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to My Blog! on Jaan

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Jaan, a self taught programmer. At the moment I’m trying to get into app development by learning native Android and from time to time I code in Rust. I got into coding after I got curious about Linux from the show Mr. Robot 6 years ago. The first months, I’ve probably distro-hopped more than my fingers could count. At the moment I’m a happy user of KDE Neon. This is my blog.
